title: Simple Steps to Teach Resilience
itunes:author: Michael Anderson & Dr. Timothy Johanson
itunes:summary:
John and Danny discuss the importance of letting your child problem-solve in everyday life. Featuring Michael Anderson and Dr. Timothy Johanson. Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

GIST: The Essence of Raising Life-Ready Kids: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-24?refcd=1019405

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/simple-steps-to-teach-resilience/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
